ResourceHeader.Description: HF coherent radar at Rikubetsu, Hokkaido, Japan. A radar of Super Dual Auroral Radar Network (SuperDARN) operated by Solar-Terrestrial Environment Laboratory, Nagoya University. In common mode, SuperDARN observes ionospheric plasma convection of the high- and mid-latitude regions with time resolution of 1-2 min. SuperDARN is used not only for the ionospheric research but also for the thermospheric and mesospheric research.
